languages.text: "Все просто, шерин. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} заправляет теневым рынком {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, предоставляя всем, кто может оплатить их услуги, доступ к особым товарам. Да, я сейчас говорю в том числе и о ксеноартефактах — оружии, технологиях... иногда даже отдельных видах, ммм, живых существ".

traits.locale_text: "Все просто, шерин. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} заправляет теневым рынком {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, предоставляя всем, кто может оплатить их услуги, доступ к особым товарам. Да, я сейчас говорю в том числе и о ксеноартефактах — оружии, технологиях... иногда даже отдельных видах, ммм, живых существ".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."
languages.original_text: "Все просто, шерин. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} заправляет теневым рынком {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, предоставляя всем, кто может оплатить их услуги, доступ к особым товарам. Да, я сейчас говорю в том числе и о ксеноартефактах — оружии, технологиях... иногда даже отдельных видах, ммм, живых существ".

traits.locale_text: "It really is simple, shereen. Kasballica is running the Imperium's black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their service. Yes, I am talking about xeno artifacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures, m-m-m."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “实际上真的很简单，亲爱的。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}经营着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的黑市，为那些能负担得起服务的人提供特别的商品。没错，我指的就是异形造物，包括外星武器与技术设备……有时甚至会包括某些……活着的东西。”
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: “实际上真的很简单，亲爱的。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}经营着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的黑市，为那些能负担得起服务的人提供特别的商品。没错，我指的就是异形造物，包括外星武器与技术设备……有时甚至会包括某些……活着的东西。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The Kasballica runs the Imperium's black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

languages.text: «Es muy sencillo, shereen. La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} controla el mercado negro del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, ofreciendo artículos especiales a quienes pueden permitirse sus servicios. Sí, también hablo de xenoartefactos: armas y tecnología alienígena... y, a veces, incluso cierto tipo de... seres vivos».
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: «Es muy sencillo, shereen. La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} controla el mercado negro del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, ofreciendo artículos especiales a quienes pueden permitirse sus servicios. Sí, también hablo de xenoartefactos: armas y tecnología alienígena... y, a veces, incluso cierto tipo de... seres vivos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「簡単なことさ。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のブラックマーケットを運営し、サービスを受けられる者に特別な商品を提供しているのさ。そう、アタシが言ってるのは異種族のアーティファクトのことでもある…それに、異星の武器や技術…時には、ある種の生物さえも扱ってるのさ」
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単なことさ。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のブラックマーケットを運営し、サービスを受けられる者に特別な商品を提供しているのさ。そう、アタシが言ってるのは異種族のアーティファクトのことでもある…それに、異星の武器や技術…時には、ある種の生物さえも扱ってるのさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist im Grunde ganz simpel, Shereen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} betreibt den Schwarzmarkt des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} und bietet seine Dienste allen an, die sie sich leisten können. Ja, ich spreche auch von Xeno-Artefakten — Alien-Waffen, Technologie ... Manchmal sogar gewisse ... lebende Kreaturen."
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist im Grunde ganz simpel, Shereen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} betreibt den Schwarzmarkt des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} und bietet seine Dienste allen an, die sie sich leisten können. Ja, ich spreche auch von Xeno-Artefakten — Alien-Waffen, Technologie ... Manchmal sogar gewisse ... lebende Kreaturen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est on ne peut plus simple, shereen. La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} dirige le marché noir de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, en proposant des marchandises spéciales à ceux qui ont les moyens de se payer ses services. Oui, ces marchandises incluent des xéno-artefacts : des armes et technologies aliens... Parfois même certaines espèces de... créatures vivantes. »
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: « C'est on ne peut plus simple, shereen. La {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} dirige le marché noir de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, en proposant des marchandises spéciales à ceux qui ont les moyens de se payer ses services. Oui, ces marchandises incluent des xéno-artefacts : des armes et technologies aliens... Parfois même certaines espèces de... créatures vivantes. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Çok basit şirinim. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} karaborsası, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'nın{/g} elinde. Hizmetlerinin bedelini ödeyebilenlere özel ürünler temin ediyorlar. Evet, zeno eserleri de bunlara dâhil. Zeno silahları, teknolojileri ve hatta belli türlerden bazı canlı varlıklar."
languages.original_text: "It really is simple, shereen. The {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} runs the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s black market, offering special goods to those who can afford their services. Yes, I am talking about xeno-artefacts, too — alien weapons, technology... Sometimes even certain kinds of... living creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Çok basit şirinim. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un karaborsası {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'nın elinde ve hizmetlerinin bedelini ödeyebilenlere özel ürünler temin ediyorlar. Evet, zeno eserleri de bunlara dâhil. Zeno silahları, teknolojileri ve hatta belli türlerden bazı canlı varlıklar."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
